name: Tumblr - Image Zoom
description: Makes the posted images on Tumblr bigger...scaled approximately 150% larger in size.  Affects dashboard and tagged pages only.
additional_info:
Note: Very narrow and small images can get really blurry...so it's not perfect, but it's good enough for me.

The size can be easily customized by editing the --content-width value, but you'll need a modern browser that supports CSS variables (Firefox 31 or higher, or maybe a current version of Chrome but I'm not sure).
